author: Arline Mann
description: Arline Mann, a former Goldman Sachs managing director turned painter, brings a lawyer’s precision and an artist's intuition to illuminate the quiet resurgence of representational painting in a digital age. Mann dissects the movement's broader return to classical technique, human touch and lived experience, making a case for realism as not just tradition, but a countercurrent and a lasting presence in contemporary art.
title: Realism Returns: The Resurgence of Traditional Art Skills in the Digital Age

author: Christa Terry
description: This year, the museum's glam bash tipped its (designer) hat to artist Amy Sherald, curator Barbara Haskell and philanthropist Richard DeMartini.
title: Margaritas, Max Mara and TLC: Inside the Whitney’s Glamorous 2025 Gala

author: Elisa Carollo
description: "What has stood out most to me in the reopening of the Frick is the extraordinary response it has elicited," director Axel Rüger told Observer .
title: Observer’s Guide to the New Frick: Highlights and Hidden Details
